title: Admin UI: runtime HEX codes for background and booking CTA button

requirements.summary: Add an admin-facing section on an existing admin page that shows copyable, runtime-computed HEX values for the global page background and the primary booking CTA button color.
acceptanceCriteria: A visible section is available on an existing admin page (e.g., /admin/technical-status) that lists at minimum: Background color (HEX) and Primary/CTA button color (HEX).
The HEX values are derived from the actual computed styles at runtime (not hard-coded), so they reflect the current theme (including dark mode if enabled).
Each listed color value can be copied by the user (e.g., via a copy button or selectable text).
All user-facing labels in this new section are in English.

file_operations.description: Add color utilities to normalize computed CSS color strings (e.g., rgb/rgba) and convert them to HEX (e.g., #RRGGBB), suitable for showing copyable values in the admin UI.

Create a hook that derives HEX values at runtime by rendering/using hidden probe elements styled with the app’s real theme classes (e.g., background and a primary Button style), reading their computed styles, converting to HEX, and re-computing when theme changes (e.g., MutationObserver on the documentElement class for dark mode toggles).

Implement a reusable admin-only UI section that displays: (1) Page background (HEX) and (2) Booking CTA / primary button (HEX). Provide a copy interaction per value (Clipboard API with a safe fallback) and ensure all labels in this section are English. Compose existing UI components (e.g., Card, Button, Badge/Alert as appropriate); do not modify files in frontend/src/components/ui.

Wire the new ThemeHexCodesSection into the existing /admin/technical-status page so the HEX section is clearly visible and accessible for admins to copy values; ensure only the new section’s labels are in English and that values are sourced via the runtime-computed hook (not hard-coded).
